title: Tesla Sales Drop 19% in UK, while BYD Sales More Than Triple
description:
Tesla sales have dropped in some markets this year, dropped even more in other markets, and risen in a few. At times, the UK has been one of Tesla’s bright spots. However, the trend lately has been downward again, and the company had a very bad November. According to non-official ... [continued]

The post Tesla Sales Drop 19% in UK, while BYD Sales More Than Triple appeared first on CleanTechnica.
